reporting-org.narrative: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs

title.narrative: Provide Life Savings Health Services for PIN, including Internal displaced people and population in hard to reach area 2017.

description.narrative:
As Lamset Shifa is well known among the communities and people in need to be a medical service provider, it became the main distention to those people in need of medical treatment and cannot afford it. Thus, we witness a massive continuous influx of applicants each month, estimated at 1100 patients per month. Prior to the crisis, Lamset Shifa was able to respond to all people who seek the association’s support. Currently, due to financial barriers, Lamset Shifa can’t meet the needs of people who ask the association support and only provide services to 56% of them. Taking into consideration that these needs are increasingly raising as people fail to meet their basic needs. Those people varies between host communities and internally displaced people, in addition to residents of hard to reach areas who obtain a facilitation letter to visit Damascus governorate to receive the treatments that shall save their lives.
This project aims to cover all lifesaving surgeries for people in need, including internal displaced people in all governorates and population in hard to reach areas. In order to ensure that the services provided is lifesaving and appropriate to the patients’ medical status Lamset Shifa will refer all applicants to doctors who will diagnose the patients’ medical situation and recommend the needed treatment. Then the patients are referred to a laboratories that will provide all needed diagnosis tests. Based on doctor recommendation and diagnosis tests results, the patients are referred to hospitals to conduct the surgeries or any other treatment recommended by the doctors, and Lamset Shifa will ensure to provide them with all medicines or supplements to ensure achieving the best medical results.
1-Orthopidic (most of the people due to injuries ,accidents ,war and the tough situation in Syria have injured and suffer from bone fractures and a lot of pain and need surgeries and surgeries equipment which has a high cost which most of the Syrian people can’t afford)
2- neurological ( due to war, moving from place to another , bombs and war actions a lot of people get injured and sometimes it injured their spinal cords and affect them and they may suffer from abnormality so they need neuro surgeries as fast as possible to maintain their health and not get any abnormality doctors can’t fix or heal )
3- artificial limbs ( due to war and all the bombs and bullets some of the people have lost a limb or many limbs and they will become handicap and can’t work and they will become consumers and can’t support their families so we want to help them and save their families and get a job so they can do living from it so we will provide the limbs by doctor instructions and company with experience in making artificial limbs )
4 –incubation new born ( now a days many women after delivering the babies need incubation due to many reasons and for many days which has an expensive costs so we need to help the mum who is suffering and save the baby life which in danger to lose )
5- examination and diagnosis procedure ( before doing any surgeries we send the patient to specialist doctor to examine them and write their diagnosis All our activities the beneficiaries from it men women boys and girls form either host communities , IDPs and resident in hard to reach areas
